tag_narrative: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
Significantly reduce all forms of violence and related death rates everywhere
title_narrative: Contribution to the UNMAS Programme: "Explosive Hazard Management: Enabling Humanitarian and Stabilization Efforts in Liberated Areas
Iniziativa per la gestione dei rischi di ordigni esplosivi a supporto del processo di stabilizzazione in zone liberate dal Daesh
sector_narrative: Removal of land mines and explosive remnants of war
description_narrative: The present initiative has the overall objective to enable and strengthen humanitarian,  stabilization and development interventions in areas liberated from Daesh occupation and to create conditions for the sustainable and confident return of displaced people to liberated areas through humanitarian mine action activities. Activities will focus on two main component of the overall UNMAS strategy: a) assessments, survey and explosive hazard management; b) mine risk education and awareness to IDPs and host communities. The geographical focus of the explosive hazard management and risk education activities will be in Mosul city and Ninewa Province, with specific clearance  activities focussing on cultural heritage sites of old city of Mosul.

Obiettivo specifico dell’iniziativa è quello di creare le condizioni necessarie per l’attuazione di interventi umanitari, di ricostruzione e stabilizzazione nelle aree liberate dall’occupazione dell’ISIS e di rafforzare il coordinamento strategico del governo per garantire un approccio comune alle operazione di bonifica degli ordigni esplosivi
